!contents -R2 -g -p -f -h
!1 Testar uppdatering av Organisation
Det ska vara möjligt att uppdatera Organisation via REST API.

Testet visar att adminanvändare har möjlighet att uppdatera organisationsposten

!*** Läs organisation divaOrganisation:250 (Avstängd)

!| RecordEndpointFixture |
| authToken | type | id | testReadRecord? | getStatusType? |
| $adminAuthToken | divaOrganisation | 1450 | =~/"value":"Nordiska ministerrådet"/ | OK |

*!
!***> Uppdatera divaOrganisation:250 med nytt namn (Avstängd)

!| RecordEndpointFixture |
| authToken | type | id | json | testUpdateRecord? | getStatusType? |
| $adminAuthToken | divaOrganisation | 1450 | {"name":"organisation","children":[{"name":"recordInfo","children":[{"name":"id","value":"1450"},{"name":"type","children":[{"name":"linkedRecordType","value":"recordType"},{"name":"linkedRecordId","value":"divaOrganisation"}]},{"name":"createdBy","children":[{"name":"linkedRecordType","value":"coraUser"},{"name":"linkedRecordId","value":"coraUser:4412982402853626"}]},{"name":"dataDivider","children":[{"name":"linkedRecordType","value":"system"},{"name":"linkedRecordId","value":"diva"}]},{"name":"tsCreated","value":"2017-01-01 00:00:00.0"},{"name":"updated","children":[{"name":"updatedBy","children":[{"name":"linkedRecordType","value":"coraUser"},{"name":"linkedRecordId","value":"coraUser:4412982402853626"}]},{"name":"tsUpdated","value":"2017-01-01 00:00:00.0"}],"repeatId":"0"}]},{"name":"organisationName","value":"Norska ministerrådet"},{"name":"alternativeName","children":[{"name":"organisationName","value":"Nordiska ministerrådet"},{"name":"language","value":"en"}]},{"name":"country","value":"SE"},{"name":"URL","value":"http://www.norden.org"},{"name":"organisationType","value":"unit"},{"name":"organisationNumber","value":"3333333333"},{"name":"eligible","value":"yes"}]} | | OK |

*!
!*** Läs divaOrganisation:250 igen för att se att den är uppdaterad (Avstängd)

!| RecordEndpointFixture |
| authToken | type | id | testReadRecord? | getStatusType? |
| $adminAuthToken | divaOrganisation | 1450 | =~/"value":"Norska ministerrådet"/ | OK |

*!
